Package com.example.ss7g7.stars

Class Course

java.lang.Object
com.example.ss7g7.stars.Course
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class Course
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable

Course Class

The Course class is a class that contains the information of a certain course.

This class is used to determine the course details. The course details are as follows: Course Code, Course Name, School Name, AU, Course Availability,Lecture details. The Lecture details are as follows: Venue, Remark, Group, Timing This class also provides getters and setters for the above mentioned.

Since:
1.0
Version:
%I%
Author:
Jabir Shah Halith created on 2020/10/19
